definition: strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort

sentences.english: The L. A. Lakers were the best team in the VERY tight Western Conference this season.
sentences.chinese: 湖人隊是這個賽季西部豪強紛爭中最優秀的一支球隊。

definition: Yanzi (-c 500 BC), famous statesman from Qi of the Warring States, also known as 晏子, hero of book 晏子春秋
Zhang Juzheng (1525-1582), Grand Secretary during the Ming dynasty, credited with bringing the dynasty to its apogee
strict law/cruel punishment/to carry out cruel law rigorously
running of armed forces/military management/to govern armed forces/to direct troops
to dispatch troops/to send an army/to mobilize forces
commander-in-chief, the equivalent of king in Chinese chess
